intro: Desmos yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan desmos, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its woody stems and palmate leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. It is typically found in moist, shaded environments in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
